p: Total RNA samples were either extracted with RNAiso PLUS (Takara) or RNeasy Mini Kit (Qiagen) following manufacturer’s protocol. RT-qPCR was performed as previously described [ 45]. For reverse transcription of viral RNA, Uni12 primer with sequence 5´-AGCAAAAGCAGG-3´ was used. qPCR primers used in the study are listed below: MAVS: 5´-GTCACTTCCTGCTGAGA-3´ and 5´-TGCTCTGAATTCTCTCCT-3´. IFNβ: 5´-AGGACAGGATGAACTTTGAC-3´ and 5´ -TGATAGACATTAGCCAGGA G-3´. TNFα: 5´-TCTGGGCAGGTCTACTTTGG-3´ and 5´-CCTAAGCCCCCAATTCTCTT-3´. vRNA S4: 5´-CGAGAAGAATGTGGCAGTGA-3´ and 5´-CTCCGTTGAATGTGTGGTTG-3´. vRNA S6: 5´-CAACCAAGGCAGC ATTACCT-3´ and 5´-ACGGATGGGACAAAGAGATG-3´. GAPDH: 5´-GGATTTGGTCGTATTGGG-3´ and 5´-GGAAGATTGGTGATGGGATT-3´.
